about.description: I'm Sara, but you can call me Vanellope! ðŸŽ®âœ¨ I'm a passionate animator and graphic designer who lives and breathes visual storytelling. When I'm not creating animations, you'll find me lost in epic soundtracks from Coco, Interstellar, and symphonic metal that fuels my creativity. I believe every frame tells a story, and every story deserves an epic soundtrack!

music.title: Soundtrack of My Life

music.description: Music is the heartbeat of my creative process. From the powerful riffs of symphonic metal to the emotional depth of cinematic soundtracks, every project I create is inspired by the music I love.
